entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
C, C++, Java, Python çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç¨‹åº Hello World!

C

include <stdio.h>

int main(void)
{
	printf("Hello World!");
	return 0;
}

C++

#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	cout << "Hello World!" << endl;
	return 0;
}

Java

//Test.java
public class Test() {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println("Hello World!");
	}
}

Python

print('Hello World')
